section.p: The men start to yawn. ‘Great gods, I feel sleepy!’ announces the bosun, rubbing his eyes.
‘Me, too,’ agrees the quartermaster. ‘Like I’d been poleaxed.’
Despite your stern orders, they go to lie down on the stone slabs.
‘Ah, this is a comfy couch,’ murmurs the bosun as he shuts his eyes. ‘Permit us to take just a quick nap, skipper.’
